name: Legend Has It
description:
The legend of Langard, as told by the village wise man. Live through this hero's story.

  • WASD - move
  • Left Mouse Click - use sword
  • Move Mouse - rotate sword around character

Asset Credit:

  • Modern interiors - RPG Tileset [16X16] by LimeZu (itch.io)
  • Serene Village - revamped - RPG Tileset [16x16] by LimeZu (itch.io)
  • Generic RPG pack by Estúdio Vaca Roxa (itch.io)
